name: uuniq
description: Unique Snowflake IDs and Symbolic IDs that can be generated for thousands of years.

scripts.test: npm run test:snowflake && npm run test:symbolic
scripts.test:snowflake: npm run ./test/Snowflake/default.ts && npm run ./test/Snowflake/difference.ts && npm run ./test/Snowflake/epoch.ts && npm run ./test/Snowflake/place_id.ts && npm run ./test/Snowflake/sequence.ts
scripts.test:symbolic: npm run ./test/Symbolic/default.ts && npm run ./test/Symbolic/difference.ts && npm run ./test/Symbolic/epoch.ts && npm run ./test/Symbolic/place_id.ts && npm run ./test/Symbolic/sequence.ts
